channel.title: 508 Client Help! Please respond
channel.description:
[size=18pt][i]I'm [b]new[/b] to 508 servers so I may not know anything.[/i][/size]
Okey when I run [b]any[/b] 508 client , a error [b]always[/b] comes up. The error is that the client gets stuck while loading , it gets stuck at "Connecting to update server". When it gets stuck like that the CMD prompt says
[tt]error_game_js5connect.[/tt]
Anyone know how to fix? By the way I have a Windows 7 laptop windows, I do have java and all that since I've had 317 servers online.

item.title: 508 Client Help! Please respond
item.dc:creator: @Reamm28 Reamm28
item.description:
@Reamm28 wrote:

Dude , I download the source and client of Scaperune and they do mach , btw and i run the source before the client and it doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Client Help! Please respond
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

That my friend means either if you’re running the server (meaning you have the source too) You’re not turning it on or Your client/server wont match together.

Read full topic
